pkgmetadata.longdescription: Predict Antimicrobial Peptides // A toolkit to predict antimicrobial peptides from protein sequences on a genome-wide scale. It incorporates a support vector machine model trained on publicly available antimicrobial peptide data using calculated physico-chemical and compositional sequence properties described in Meher et al. (2017) doi:10.1038/srep42362. In order to support genome-wide analyses this model is designed to accept any type of protein as input and calculation of compositional properties has been optimised for high-throughput use.
